title: Elle Duncan on if Russell Wilson is doing a bit, Tom Brady risking it all, and racially ambiguous names in sports
description:
Bomani Jones and Elle Duncan discuss names in sports that don't match the racial identity of the player involved (8:23), Russell Wilson's corniness and slow start in Denver (13:56), Tom Brady risking it all for what will likely be a loss in the Divisional Round (26:15), how people in Boston are just mean (30:57), and why the Cowboys really are America's team (38:37).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
